comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Yvonne Gouraud was an adopted child of Jackson Gouraud and his wife, originally Aimée Crocker, later Princess Miskinoff (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aim%C3%A9e_Crocker). In February 1916, she was witness at the trial of the joint separation actions filed by Prince Alexander Miskinoff and his wife (her mother) (The Washington herald., February 18, 1916, Image 1, col. 4 "PRINCE LOVED FOSTER CHILD") See also The Evening herald., February 29, 1916, Image 1, with photo (however, Yvonne Gouraud was not the stepdaughter of the Princess, but of the Prince). An extensive article about her is in The Washington times., October 30, 1921, SUNDAY MORNING, Page 9 Her mother:
